title: Twist of Fortune
content:
Twist of Fortune Rare 2~9 Damage 1d8+1Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Twist of Fortune: When you roll 2 or less with this weapon's damage die, reroll it and take the new result. Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: They say rich folk are never truly happy: especially true when they're targeted with this morningstar. Morningstar 1.8 310

Twist of Fortune

Weapon Enchantment +1
